TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityHeaderLayout extends System.Enum

summary.para: Describes the layout of the security header.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout Lax = int32(1)

summary.para: Items are added to the security header in any order that confirms to WSS: SOAP Message security.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout LaxTimestampFirst = int32(2)

summary.para: Items are added to the security header in any order that confirms to WSS: SOAP Message security except that the first element in the security header must be a wsse:Timestamp element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout LaxTimestampLast = int32(3)

summary.para: Items are added to the security header in any order that confirms to WSS: SOAP Message security except that the last element in the security header must be a wsse:Timestamp element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityHeaderLayout Strict = int32(0)

summary.para: Items are added to the security header according to the general principle of “declare before use”.
